column4: What is the standard console-based web browser that comes with Ubuntu? I can't remember the command. :/
www-browser  links to whatever it is.
and the links will take you all the way to /etc/alternatives/www-browser, which over here links to 'lynx'
aah, w3m was the command I was looking for
i may have set it to lynx myself. I don't know if lynx was the default.
